column4: hello, I'm a 62 year old retired police dispatcher from alabama, and my grandson told me about your ubuntu system so I got it loaded up on my computer. I did it all myself, just about, now I just can't get my screens set up quite right. My grandson said there was some community on this chat that could help me get it fixed up.
But this time I am using Gaim.
this is the same place, okay. should I re-explain my problem?
- Welcome! - sorry to hear all didn't go smoothly. - you can try sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg or follow the link ubotu will give you
